channel.title: Orquesta Workflow
channel.description:
Need to implement an orquesta workflow with following reqruirements: 1.It has to take multiple servers of same os type as input 2. It has to verify let say wget command is installed or not (Some servers may be installed with wget and some are not) 3. If wget command is not installed then it has to install.
Kindly help me on this topic.

item.title: Orquesta Workflow
item.dc:creator: punkrokk
item.description:
Hi @Narendra4st2, if you checkout the docs and give what you are trying to do a shot, the folks around here would be happy to help you. Unfortunately, no one is going to just make you what you are looking for. Good luck!

Read full topic

item.title: Orquesta Workflow
item.dc:creator: Narendra4st2
item.description:
Need to implement an orquesta workflow with following reqruirements:
1.It has to take multiple servers of same os type as input
2. It has to verify let say wget command is installed or not (Some servers may be installed with wget and some are not)
3. If wget command is not installed then it has to install.

Kindly help me on this topic.

Read full topic
